description: Number of interlacings (or riffle shuffles) required to restore deck of n cards to original order: interlacing is done by keeping first card, putting second at end of deck, keeping next, putting next at end and so on.
comments: See A217948 for more about the riffle shuffle.
links: Gary Antonick, The Polka Dot Puzzle, NY Times Wordplay blog.
author: Marie-Christine Haton (Marie-Christine.Haton(AT)loria.fr)
